thread.title: BRIEF-Ensync Energy Announces Additions To Executive Management Team

title: BRIEF-Ensync Energy Announces Additions To Executive Management Team

organizations.name: brief-ensync energy announces additions to executive management team reuters
brief-ensync energy announces additions to executive management team

text:
41 PM / in 17 minutes BRIEF-Ensync Energy Announces Additions To Executive Management Team Reuters Staff 
Feb 12 (Reuters) - Ensync Inc: 
* ENSYNC ENERGY SYSTEMS ANNOUNCES KEY ADDITIONS TO EXECUTIVE MANAGEMENT TEAM * SAYS WILLIAM DALLAPIAZZA APPOINTED CFO 
* CONCURRENT WITH HIRING OF DALLAPIAZZA, CO ANNOUNCES RESIGNATION OF FREDERICK VASKE, CHIEF ADMINISTRATIVE OFFICER Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
